channel.title: rfc-2229 Working Group on Rust Lang - Compiler Team
channel.description: Recent content in rfc-2229 Working Group on Rust Lang - Compiler Team

item.title: 2019.03.05 - Roadmap plan
item.description: We chalked out the detailed roadmap for the working group. We also discussed how to addressed the test failures caused by the PRs this and this. The solution for the same can he found under the section Error Message here. The recording for the entire meeting can be found here.

item.title: FAQs
item.description: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Looks like no questions have been asked yet! If you have a question, feel free to file an issue or ask in the working group’s Zulip stream.
